title: [Large-scale] UDL/UDI-Integrated Instructional Design for Academic Library Tutorial Redesign

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library usage experience and elementary proficiency in digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical training program for elementary school teachers to enhance their academic resource utilization skills

learning_goals: Learners can navigate the main functions of an academic library system with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners can produce tutorial content applying three or more accessibility strategies (e.g., text-to-speech, alternative text) according to UDL principles
Learners can complete a five-step process from library resource search to citation generation with 80% accuracy through team-based activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
